{{Location Intro|description=<p>During the [[cataclysm]], Tunigi Hollow was the epicenter for numerous [[Abyss]]al monsters and mass [[forbidden knowledge]] pollution originating from [[Khaenri'ah]]. To avert the crisis, several gods, including [[Greater Lord Rukkhadevata]] and [[Egeria]], ventured to Tunigi Hollow to suppress the defilement seeping from the godless nation below.</p>}}

==Trivia==
* After completing the Rite of Chinvat, jumping into Tunigi Hollow will send the player to the [[Harvisptokhm]] instead.
===Etymology===
* Tunigi Hollow may be named after ''yer tunigi'', "the {{w|Yurt|smokehole}} of the earth," a name of Turkic origin for the entrance to the underworld in {{W|Altai people|Altai}} {{W|Shamanism in Siberia|shamanism}}.<ref>Google Books: [https://books.google.com/books?id=OxCnDwAAQBAJ Shamanism: Archaic Techniques of Ecstasy]</ref>
